abstract: University of California, Davis, Chancellor Linda P B Katehi resigns after investigation finds she violated several university policies; Katehi was placed on administrative leave in April following allegations she misused university funds in effort to suppress public information about behavior of campus police officers during 2011 student demonstration.

headline.print_headline: Chancellor in California Resigns Over Claims She Misused Funds
headline.main: U.C. Davis Chancellor Resigns Under Fire

snippet: Linda P.B. Katehi, who had been on leave since April, was accused of using university funds to eliminate negative online search results about the school over a 2011 pepper spray incident....
lead_paragraph: Linda P.B. Katehi, who had been on leave since April, was accused of using university funds to eliminate negative online search results about the school over a 2011 pepper spray incident.
